summary: ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS THE VEHICLE WOULD EXPERIENCE ENGINE FAILURE.  ON ONE OCCASION THE CONSUMER PLACED THE VEHICLE IN PARK, WITH NO A/C, AND ALL OF A SUDDEN THE VEHICLE STARTED SHAKING/RUNNING ROUGH.  AFTER SEVERAL ATTEMPTS THE ENGINE FIRED AND KEPT RUNNING.  THE DEALER STATED THERE WERE NO PROBLEMS FOUND.  THE CONSUMER HAD SPOKEN TO A TECHNICIAN WHO SAID THAT THE FUEL PUMP, CAUSED A VAPOR LOCK, AND THAT'S WHY THE ENGINE STOPPED.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED FORD TO REIMBURSE HE/SHE FOR THE MONIES SPENT.   SCC     *JB
